items.details:
Upcoming Test

Friday, September 19 - Science Topic 1 test
Tuesday, September 23rd - Language Arts - Grammar Workshop Unit 1 L1-8
Wednesday, September 24th - Math - Topic 3
Monday, September 29th - Social Studies - Topic 1

Reading.

Complete pages 128-129 in my view book

I have assigned a story on American Crocodiles

Please complete BEFORE FRIDAY! Some students did not submit their answers. Please answer every question and SUBMIT.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

PLEASE TRY YOUR BEST TO LOG IN AND GIVE AN ANSWER. PLEASE DO NOT WRITE KOREAN OR WRITE ‘I DON’T KNOW’

The spelling words for TOMORROW are 

dream
amazing
bored
discovery
proud
pilot
swamp
mammals
hummingbird
shortcut
clinic
manatee
crocodile 
rare
scientist 

Please revise them before Friday.

The current story in the book is Cocoliso

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aGrbVelGJOI 

Please watch the video and become familiar with the story.

You borrowed some new books from the library. Please try to have a regular reading pattern and complete the AR quizzes after you read each book. 

Math

Complete Additional Practice 3-6

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science 

TOMORROW IS THE SCIENCE TEST! 

Today I gave you a study guide! PLEASE read this tonight and look over all the pages related to motion and forces (Pages 6-49)

Read and complete pages 44-47 (The red assessment pages in  your book)

Here is a blooket you can practice for the test! The questions are similar to the test.

https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=68c78a9e9a08a844bb252aab 

Read and complete pages 44-47 (The red assessment pages in  your book)

Language Arts

Complete pages 38-39 in the grammar workshop book.

https://www.sadlierconnect.com/anonymous/view-resource/gw?limitProgramTocIds=&productId=494&programSeriesId=3&programTocId=208&resourceId=287888&hash=dW5kZWZpbmVk 

Korean 

Page 110-114

Social Studies 

Read and complete pages 40-42 in the social studies book.  These are the assessment practice pages so they will help you with the test coming up soon.

Social Studies Group Project

Your groups are: 

Land and Water -  Stella / Jenny / Jiwoo
Weather Climate and Forces of Nature - Siwoo / Ian Choi / Jason
Using Earth’s Resources - Jey / Noah / Alex
Interacting with the Environment -  Woojoo / Yujoo / Ian Sa

Each group has three students. You need to read your chapter in the book and summarize the important information. Then you will reteach your lesson to the class.

You must do three things. A Google Slides or PowerPoint presentation that is bright and clear. An A3 poster that is colorful and eye-catching. A quiz that is fun and gets the class involved. The quiz could be an X and O quiz, a fill in the gap quiz, or something online.

Each person in the group should take one job. One person makes the slides. One person makes the poster. One person makes the quiz.

Your goal is to make your classmates learn from you in a fun and creative way. You will present this on Wednesday, September 24th, the lesson before the social studies test.

ReadWorks Assignment 5/6 – Tropical Rainforests / Natural Resources (8 stories)

I have assigned a story on Rainforest and 8 stories about natural disasters on ReadWorks. Please complete it within the next 2 weeks.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
